charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1101_0100:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted
Emmet and Raihan chatting cheerfully in town.
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_0300:
We had a great conversation about Dynamaxing
and Double Battles!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_0401_0500:
It was! Why don’t you chat with us too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_0302_0600: Is this a Double Battle study group?
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_0402_0700:
Yes! I’m so excited that I can learn something
new!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_0800: You sure are into studying, huh, Emmet!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_0900:
Teaching always feels like time well spent when
your student’s so eager to learn!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_1000:
Well, the more you know, the more fun your
battles will be!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_1100:
Actually, while I’ve been having serious battles
and aiming for the top here on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_1200:
Eelektross and I learned how to Dynamax! That
opened us up to new strategies!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_1300:
I was curious how best to use Dynamax in
Double Battles and team battles...
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_1400:
So who better to ask than Raihan? Not only is he
from Dynamax’s home turf, he’s also good at
Double Battles!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_1500:
In battle, combinations that use Dynamax
are complex!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_1600:
There are loads of moves that can affect the field
of play.
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_1700:
So you’ve gotta do your best to know what’s
going down in any given situation, or else you’ll
have a rough time!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_1800:
True! In a Double Battle, if you misread one thing,
the rest of the battle will be totally different.
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_1900:
Eelektross has always battled together with me on
Unova’s Battle Subway...
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_2000:
But now, he’s still showing me a new side to him!
It’s never boring when he’s around!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_2100: I like combinations of two Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_2200: I like combinations of Pasio sync pairs, too.
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_2300:
I’m so glad I was able to chat with you, Raihan!
We think alike!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_2500: But chatting isn’t enough, is it?
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_2600:
Let’s have a Double Battle! Let’s have a Double
Battle right now!
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_2700:
I mean, sure, but...we don’t have any partners to
team up with yet.
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_2800:
Even if [Name:PlayerNickname ] was up for it,
we’d still be short one person.
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_3000: I like to see different combinations of Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0109_10_kudari/2301_1201_3100:
But my combination with Ingo also makes me feel
so very excited!
